entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
